content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court decided to divide the assets between the two parties involved in a matrimonial property case the applicant was awarded personal property rights to half of a plot of land half of a shared apartment and an audi q7 the defendant was also awarded the same share of the plot of land and apartment the court ordered the defendant to pay the applicant compensation for a higher share of the property the text mentions various articles related to matrimonial property and the division of assets between spouses the applicant is seeking to dissolve the marriage establish residence for their minor son and receive monthly maintenance payments the defendant partially accepts the application for divorce and the establishment of residence but disagrees with the division of property and the amount of compensation the court must decide on the division of property and the allocation of costs the court determines that the property should be divided equally between the parties and awards the applicant a car the court also orders the applicant to pay the defendant compensation and the defendant to pay the applicants costs both parties are responsible for paying their own legal costs with the defendant also being ordered to pay additional costs to the state budget

metadata.cost: 109.60 EUR (legal fees) + 765.98 EUR (court and legal fees) to be borne by the defendant + 496.02 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the applicant
